payload.innovation_story: Pamrevlumab combines statistically meaningful FVC preservation with biomarker-driven patient selection in PF-ILD, and partner-ready manufacturing plus orphan pricing elevate it to a Go call.

clinical.summary: Phase 3 ZEPHYRUS-1 hit its primary with 128 mL FVC benefit and clean safety profile.

evidence.text: Pamrevlumab arm lost 260 mL vs 388 mL placebo over 48 weeks (p=0.01).
Open-label extension maintained lung function with no new safety findings.

literature.summary: Multiple journals confirm CTGF inhibition reduces fibroblast proliferation and collagen deposition in PF-ILD models.

evidence.text: CTGF neutralization cut hydroxyproline content by 37% in bleomycin mice.

market.summary: Premium orphan pricing with 45k PF-ILD patients and limited head-to-head competition drives >$1.6B TAM.

evidence.text: KOL panel expects 35% adoption within 3 years given combination potential with nintedanib.
